sentence.Network_en: He ploughed his energies into his father's billboard business.

sentence.Network_en: The poem employs as its first lines a verse plagiarized from a billboard.
sentence.Network_cn: 这首诗开头的几行抄袭了一个广告牌上的一节诗。

sentence.Network_en: She knew every house - front, every street crossing, every billboard, every tree, every dog.
